name: Ruya
description: A game of tranquillity through the art of matching pieces of Ruya in her world of dreams. Visit surrealist landscapes, decorate yourself in flowers and introspect. A calming minimal experience with juicy interactions and cool colour combinations to make you feel at ease.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: Intel Core i3 M380 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 197 MB available space
